lyrics_features.cleaned_text: It's a lazy day I'm down with nothing else to do It's a crazy day I got a thing that I want to try with you Now baby don't you go away please don't spoil my lazy day Isn't it better didn't you know Just sitting down here by my radio I'm gonna make you worry none about your income tax No there's no need to worry I'll teach you how to relax It's a lazy day I'm down with nothing else to do It's a crazy day I got a thing that I want to try with you Now baby don't you go away please don't spoil my lazy day No you don't have to think about nothing to do When I get you down to my barbacue I'm gonna make you feel funny And sparkel like a brand new dime No I don't have any money But I always got plenty of time It's a lazy day I'm down with nothing else to do It's a crazy day I got a thing that I want to try with you Now baby don't you go away please don't spoil my lazy day
